page.title: 20Shawforth - Finale/Credits
page.content: Shawforth has strong links with the past in the form of its fairs, customs and its traditional stone buildings, which have changed little in the last 100 years. We hope, however, that these pages have given the reader some insight into Shawforth as it is in 1985. Many thanks to the many local people for their guidance and tolerance, to Mr. D. Entwistle for the photographs and to the following authors:- { St. John with St. Michael School Melvyn Matier, Kimberley Thompson, Sam Holden, Sharon Greenwood, Rebecca Cook, Kelly Morgan, Christa Sanderson, Lyndsey Needham, Noah Barron, Sally Entwistle, Mrs S. Cormack, Mr. J.H. Maunders { { Leavengreave County Primary School Beth Williams, Clare Mitchell, Helen Mitchell, Jamie Williams, Mark Moores
